  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103138</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103138</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Recombinaison de la lumière - prisme simple</string>
            <string language="en">Light recombination - single prism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Rekombination - einzelnes Prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recombination claro - único prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricombinazione chiara - singolo prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφρύς επανασυνδυασμός - ενιαίο πρίσμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recombinación ligera - solo prisma</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Première sur trois illustrations sur la recombinaison de la lumière en utilisant un rayon de lumière blanche et un prisme qui peuvent  être utilisés dans un exercice de traçage de rayon. Montré ici est un rayon de lumière blanche incident dans un seul prisme.</string>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations on light recombination using white light ray and prism which can be used as ray tracing exercise. Shown here is a white light ray incident to a single prism.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">recombinaison de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light recombination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">prismes</string>
            <string language="en">prisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">traçage de rayon</string>
            <string language="en">ray tracing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réfraction</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">spectre</string>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière blanche</string>
            <string language="en">white light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen auf heller 
Rekombination mit weißem hellem Strahl und Prisma, die als 
verfolgenübung des Strahls benutzt werden können. Hier gezeigt
ein weißes Ereignis des hellen Strahls zu einem einzelnen Prisma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações no 
recombination claro usando o raio claro e o prisma brancos que podem 
ser usados como o exercício seguindo do raio. É mostrado aqui 
um incident branco do raio claro a um único prisma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni sulla 
ricombinazione chiara usando raggio luminoso e prisma bianchi che 
possono essere usati come esercitazione seguente del raggio. È 
indicato qui un avvenimento bianco del raggio luminoso ad un singolo 
prisma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων στον ελαφρύ επανασυνδυασμό 
που χρησιμοποιεί την άσπρα ελαφριά ακτίνα και το πρίσμα που 
μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν ως άσκηση επισήμανσης ακτίνων. 
Εμφανισμένο εδώ είναι ένα άσπρο γεγονός ελαφριών ακτίνων
σε ένα ενιαίο πρίσμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones en la 
recombinación ligera usando el rayo ligero y el prisma blancos que se
pueden utilizar como ejercicio que rastrea del rayo. Se muestra 
aquí un incidente blanco del rayo ligero a un solo prisma.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Rekombination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prismen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlverfolgung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spektrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">weißes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">recombination claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">prismas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">traçado do raio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz branca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ricombinazione chiara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prismi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tracciato del raggio</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
